ayah: قٓۚ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡمَجِيدِ
ayah_translit: qaf wal-qur'ani al-majidi
ayah_english: Qaf By the Quran the Glorious

ayah: قٓۚ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡمَجِيدِ
ayah_translit: qaf wal-qur'ani al-majidi
ayah_english: Qaf By the Quran the Glorious

ayah: قٓۚ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡمَجِيدِ
ayah_translit: qaf wal-qur'ani al-majidi
ayah_english: Qaf By the Quran the Glorious

ayah: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ
ayah_translit: bal ajibu an jaahum mundhirun min'hum faqala al-kafiruna hadha shayon ajibun
ayah_english: Nay they wonder that has come to them a warner from them So say the disbelievers This (is) a thing amazing

ayah: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ
ayah_translit: a-idha mit'na wakunna turaban dhalika raj'un ba'idun
ayah_english: What! When we die and have become dust That (is) a return far

ayah: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ
ayah_translit: qad alim'na ma tanqusu al-ardu min'hum wa'indana kitabun hafizun
ayah_english: Certainly We know what diminishes the earth of them and with Us (is) a Book guarded

ayah: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ
ayah_translit: bal kadhabu bil-haqi lamma jaahum fahum fi amrin marijin
ayah_english: Nay they denied the truth when it came (to) them so they (are) in a state confused

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ
ayah_translit: afalam yanzuru ila al-samai fawqahum kayfa banaynaha wazayyannaha wama laha min furujin
ayah_english: Then do not they look at the sky above them how We structured it and adorned it and not for it any rifts

ayah_english: Then do not they look at the sky above them how We structured it and adorned it and not for it any rifts

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ

ayah: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجِۭ بَهِيجٖ
ayah_translit: wal-arda madadnaha wa-alqayna fiha rawasiya wa-anbatna fiha min kulli zawjin bahijin
ayah_english: And the earth We have spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and We made to grow therein of every kind beautiful

ayah_translit: tabsiratan wadhik'ra likulli abdin munibin

ayah: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ
ayah_translit: wanazzalna mina al-samai maan mubarakan fa-anbatna bihi jannatin wahabba al-hasidi
ayah_english: And We have sent down from the sky water blessed then We made to grow thereby gardens and grain (for) the harvest

ayah: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ
ayah_translit: riz'qan lil'ibadi wa-ahyayna bihi baldatan maytan kadhalika al-khuruju
ayah_english: A provision for the slaves and We give life therewith (to) a land dead Thus (will be) the coming forth

ayah_translit: walaqad khalaqna al-insana wana'lamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabu ilayhi min habli al-waridi

ayah: لَّقَدۡ كُنتَ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ حَدِيدٞ
ayah_translit: laqad kunta fi ghaflatin min hadha fakashafna anka ghitaaka fabasaruka al-yawma hadidun

ayah: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

ayah_english: Who made with Allah a god another so throw him in(to) the punishment the severe

ayah_translit: qala qarinuhu rabbana ma atghaytuhu walakin kana fi dalalin ba'idin
ayah_english: Will say his companion Our Lord not I made him transgress but he was in error far

ayah_translit: qala la takhtasimu ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-wa'idi

ayah_translit: ma yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wama ana bizallamin lil'abidi
ayah_english: Not will be changed the word with Me and not I Am unjust to My slaves

ayah_translit: yawma naqulu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqulu hal min mazidin

ayah: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ
ayah_translit: man khashiya al-rahmana bil-ghaybi wajaa biqalbin munibin

ayah: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
ayah_translit: wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum batshan fanaqqabu fi al-biladi hal min mahisin
ayah_english: And how many We destroyed before them of a generation they (were) stronger than them (in) power so they explored throughout the lands Is (there) any place of escape

ayah: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ
ayah_translit: inna fi dhalika ladhik'ra liman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa al-sam'a wahuwa shahidun
ayah_english: Indeed in that surely, is a reminder for (one) who is for him a heart or (who) gives ear (who) gives ear while he (is) a witness

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٖ
ayah_translit: walaqad khalaqna al-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin wama massana min lughubin
ayah_english: And certainly We created the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between both of them in six periods and (did) not touch Us any fatigue

ayah: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ ٱلۡغُرُوبِ
ayah_translit: fa-is'bir ala ma yaquluna wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulu'i al-shamsi waqabla al-ghurubi
ayah_english: So be patient over what they say and glorify (the) praise (of) your Lord before (the) rising (of) the sun and before the setting

ayah_translit: inna nahnu nuh'yi wanumitu wa-ilayna al-masiru

ayah: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yawma tashaqqaqu al-ardu anhum sira'an dhalika hashrun alayna yasirun
ayah_english: (The) Day will split the earth from them hurrying That (is) a gathering for Us easy

ayah: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِجَبَّارٖۖ فَذَكِّرۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
ayah_translit: nahnu a'lamu bima yaquluna wama anta alayhim bijabbarin fadhakkir bil-qur'ani man yakhafu wa'idi
ayah_english: We know best [of] what they say and not (are) you over them the one to compel But remind with the Quran whoever fears My threat
